# Freedom Junk Removal

> Springfield, Illinois' trusted junk removal service. Licensed, insured, and eco-friendly.

## About

Freedom Junk Removal is a locally owned and operated junk removal company serving Springfield, IL and surrounding communities. Founded by Nick Bromer, we provide fast, affordable, and eco-friendly junk removal for homes and businesses. We are licensed and insured.

## Services

- **Residential Junk Removal**: Furniture, appliances, yard waste, general household junk. Single items to full house cleanouts.
- **Estate Cleanout**: Compassionate full-property cleanouts for estates, inherited properties, and downsizing.
- **Garage Cleanout**: Complete garage clearing, organization, and haul-away.
- **Commercial Junk Removal**: Office cleanouts, retail fixtures, warehouse debris, and construction cleanup for businesses.

## Service Area

Springfield IL, Chatham IL, Rochester IL, Sherman IL, Riverton IL, Jacksonville IL, Taylorville IL, Auburn IL, Williamsville IL

## Pricing

- Single Items: Starting at $75 (25% truck)
- Partial Load: Starting at $200 (50% truck)
- Full Load: Starting at $400 (100% truck)
- Free on-site estimates with no obligation.

- Phone: (217) 555-FREE

- Hours: Mon-Fri 7AM-7PM, Sat 8AM-5PM, Sun by appointment
